Instructions for Vendor Registration

  • For vendor registration of Central Zone Electricity Distribution Company, it will be mandatory for the vendor/manufacturer/supplier to be registered in the company's online portal "Annexure".
  • It is mandatory to fill in all the clauses in the registration form of the beder in the "Annexure" portal and upload the documents along with/ as proof where required.
  • Vendors can register for one or more products.
  • The officials of Central Zone Electricity Distribution Company will review the registration form of the vendor and decide whether the vendor can be registered or not.
  • After successful registration of the vendor, the inability of the vendor to provide the products will be inspected by the company. Non refundable inspection fee for each product inspection by the vendor is Rs. 10,000/- + GST ​​has to be deposited.
  • If the vendor is rejected on inspection, the vendor will not be empaneled. Vendor will have to get re-inspected to be empaneled.
  • The vendor will be eligible for inspection for empanelment. It will be mandatory to pay the fee 10000+GST for inspection.
  • If all the documents of the vendor are valid and declared eligible in the inspection, then the vendor will be empaneled/enlisted to provide the products in Central Zone Electricity Distribution Company.
  • Empanelment does not mean that orders for supply of products will be issued to the vendor. The order will be subject to tender specifications. Also, after the empanelment, it will be mandatory for the vendor to fulfill the terms and conditions mentioned in the tender contract issued by the company.
